original_text: They answered him, “We are offspring of Abraham and have never been enslaved to anyone. How is it that you say, ‘You will become free’?”
korean_text: 그들이 대답하되 우리가 아브라함의 자손이라 남의 종이 된 적이 없거늘 어찌하여 우리가 자유롭게 되리라 하느냐

sentences.original_text: and have never been enslaved to anyone.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 누구에게도 종이 된 적이 없느니라.

sentences.original_text: How is it that you say,
